description: Pun on song lyrics and realization.
title: Belief & Reality
n_1: Dave, singing loudly at home, enjoys his favorite tune.
n_2: Sara, annoyed, warns Dave about his constant singing.
n_3: Dave laughs it off, thinking Sara is joking.
n_4: Dave stops, finally seeing Sara's serious expression.
c2_4: Not a trace of doubt in my mind!
